creditline: Gift of Richard and Roberta Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: (a) trousers: white ground with brocade in orange; 36 X 35 inches at waist; (b) shirt: white ground with attached collar and sleeve ends with discontinuous weft patterning; 39 1/4 x 87 in. including fringe.
title: Man's Trousers and Shirt
